original_text: But he lingered. So the men seized him and his wife and his two daughters by the hand, the Lord being merciful to him, and they brought him out and set him outside the city.
korean_text: 그러나 롯이 지체하매 그 사람들이 롯의 손과 그 아내의 손과 두 딸의 손을 잡아 인도하여 성 밖에 두니 여호와께서 그에게 자비를 더하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: So the men seized him and his wife and his two daughters by the hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 사람들은 그와 그의 아내와 두 딸의 손을 잡았는데,

sentences.original_text: the Lord being merciful to him,
and set him outside the city.
